title: Pictorial Webster's: Inspiration to Completion
content:
Courtesy director Spike Jones' [_Where The Wild Things Are_ production blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141156/http:/weloveyouso.com/2009/10/pictorial-websters-will-blow-your-mind/ "We Love You So – Where The Wild Things Are – Spike Jonze - Pictorial Webster’s Will Blow Your Mind!!!"), I found this delightful short film documenting [John Carrera](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141156/http:/www.quercuspress.com/ "Quercus Press")'s decade-long effort to revive a century-old Pictorial Webster's reference book...

**[Pictorial Webster's: Inspiration to Completion](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141156/http:/vimeo.com/5228616)** from [John Carrera](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141156/http:/vimeo.com/user1882107) on [Vimeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141156/http:/vimeo.com/).  
_From the discovery of the 1898 International Dictionary to linotyping the entries to printing the last print on the vandercook to cutting the fingertabs of the deluxe edition, this video gives a quick overview of the process of creating the Pictorial Webster's fine press edition._

Very much worth watching!
author: Down10

comments.content:
Any superlative I could use would be selling it short, but I'll settle on ASTONISHING!

Thanks so much for sharing, Jesse.

I already saw that and it's an amazing job.  
Unfortunately, not all of us have access to that kind of technology..
